name: Wish- Sterling Silver Little Pendant- Rustic Aroluna Handmade
description:
A sterling silver, handmade little circle pendant with a knot. The circle is fused and hammered obtaining a rustic texture and I added a remembrance tiny knot. I oxidized this piece to bring out the texture. The Rollo chain is 16" long.
The circle is approx. 7/8 inch (22 mm) diameter.
These little circles and knots are made one by one so there's never two equal. Every piece will have slight variations from the one in the picture and will be unique.
Your order will come in a satin or organza bag. At no extra cost I can place it in a little Kraft box with a ribbon, let me know your preference.

name: Un- Sterling Silver Knot Necklace- Mini Tiny Aroluna Pendant
description:
A tiny, rustic knot necklace. Mini sterling silver pendant hanging from a 16" chain.
The knot with the ring is approx. 15 mm, but this may vary slightly as I make these little knots one by one and there's never two equal. Every piece will have slight variations from the one in the picture and will be unique. 
Matching Un, tiny earrings available, sold separately.
Your order will come in a satin or organza bag and shipped in a secure bubble envelope. At no extra cost I can place it in a little Kraft box with a ribbon, let me know your preference.
You'll find additional information in my Shop Policies.

name: Ali Sterling Silver Earrings- Tiny Knots- Aroluna Handmade
description:
Tiny little earrings, mini knots dangling from rings.  Simple for everyday wear but with a twist to make them different. 
They are all made one by one so there's never two equal. Every piece will have slight variations from the one in the picture and will be unique.
Length from the top of the ear wires: 1" (2.5 cm)
Matching Ali necklace available, sold separately.
Your order will come in a satin or organza bag and shipped in a secure bubble envelope. At no extra cost I can place it in a little Kraft box with a ribbon, let me know your preference.
You'll find additional information in my Shop Policies.

name: Daire- Sterling Silver Earrings- Tiny & Rustic- Aroluna Handmade
description:
Airy little earrings, light and comfortable for everyday wear. A tiny knot and a thin, dainty circle dangle right from the soldered hook.
Oxidized to a dark patina, please note that the patina will wear off a little with time, but at the same time the silver will acquire a beautiful, natural antique finish. 
I make these earrings one by one, there's never two equal, expect some differences from the ones in the pictures.
Length from the top of the ear wires: approx.: 3/4" (2 cm) 
The circle diameter is approx.: 7/16" (1 cm)
Orders are wrapped in tissue paper, placed in a little organza or satin bag and shipped in a secure bubble envelope.

name: Tao Sterling Silver Bracelet- Rustic Linked Knots- Aroluna Handmade
description:
My signature link, be it bracelet or necklace. The piece is part of the Knots line. I've been working with knots since my earliest days making artisan jewelry. They are all made one by one so there's never two equal. Every piece will have slight variations from the one in the picture and will be unique.
I make similar bracelets using four different sterling silver wire gauges, from smaller to larger they are Nudos, Tao, Sol and Ra. 
Length: approx 7 3/4 inches (approx.19.5 cm) - Price is for approx. 6.75" up to an 8" bracelet, ask me for pricing for a longer bracelet.
Orders are wrapped in tissue paper, placed in a satin or organza bag and shipped in a secure bubble envelope. If you prefer gift wrapped in a Kraft jewelry box with a ribbon at no extra charge,  leave me a message.
You'll find additional information in my Shop Policies.
